item.description:
We'll Meet at some restaurant/bar in the Mall (that way it's easy to find and park for out of towners), then hang out until 730 and then proceed across the street to Waterplace Park for the festivities...

CYA there !

Stay tuned for the exact meeting place. I just want to go down there and figure out which place will be best to accommodate our crowd.

Thanks - R

Sorry everyone - I tried to update it last ngiht and I guess It didnt take... my bad for not checking -
item.how_to_find_us: Joes American Bar and Grilll... look for Roger at the bar - red head with the Goatee - ask for meetup

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Waterfire Providence
